0.text: Innate: Shaco's basic attacks deal 20 − 35 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) bonus physical damage when striking an enemy from behind.

1.text: Deceive and  Two-Shiv Poison also have additional effects when they strike an enemy from behind. Backstab is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

0.text: Active: Shaco becomes  invisible for a few seconds, and after a 0.125-second delay,  blinks to the target location.

1.text: After breaking the invisibility, Shaco's next basic attack within 0.25 seconds deals bonus physical damage. The damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

2.text: Deceive's  invisibility breaks when Shaco uses a basic attack or casts  Two-Shiv Poison, but not from casting  Hallucinate. Casting  Jack in the Box causes Shaco to briefly shimmer instead, revealing his position to enemies.

3.text: Backstab: Guarantees the basic attack to  critically strike for (30% +  35%) bonus physical damage.

0.text: Active: Shaco summons a Jack in the Box at the target location which becomes  stealthed after arming over 2 seconds, lasting for up to 40 (+ 5% AP) seconds. The box is  invulnerable and  untargetable to enemies while stealthed.

1.text: The box will pop out upon enemy contact, causing all nearby enemies at the time of its trigger to  flee from it for 2 seconds, reduced against champions, who are also  rooted for 0.5 seconds. While fleeing, enemy  champions are set to a static 100  movement speed, reduced to a static 60 for  minions and  monsters.

2.text: Once triggered, the box will automatically start firing every 0.5 seconds at all nearby  visible enemies, dealing magic damage with each attack, increased against  monsters and reduced by 50% against  structures. If the box attacks only one unit, it deals increased damage.

3.text: The box stays active for 5 seconds or until destroyed, independently from its remaining inactive duration.

0.text: Passive: Shaco's basic attacks  slow enemies for 2 seconds while Two-Shiv Poison is off cooldown.

1.text: Active: Shaco throws a dagger at the target enemy that upon arrival deals them magic damage,  increased by 50% if they are below 30% of their maximum health, and  slows them for 3 seconds.

2.text: Backstab: Deals an additional 15 − 50 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage, increased to 22.5 − 75 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) when the target is below 30% of their maximum health.

0.text: Active: Shaco  vanishes for 0.5 seconds and then  blinks in the target direction while creating a copy of himself that blinks in the opposite direction, remaining within control range of him as a controllable  clone for up to 18 seconds. Hallucinate can be recast at any time while the  clone is alive.

1.text: Recast: Shaco commands the  clone to move to the target location.

2.text: When the Hallucination dies or expires, it explodes, dealing magic damage to enemies near it and leaving behind three  mini-boxes at its location which activate instantly, causing nearby enemies to  flee from them for 1 second.

3.text: The three boxes possess Jack in the Box's effects, except they have a doubled, but shared  health, and deal modified magic damage with each attack, increased if attacking a single unit.

4.text: Hallucinate's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

1.concerningText: Active: Shaco becomes  invisible for a few seconds, and after a 0.125-second delay,  blinks to the target location.
After breaking the invisibility, Shaco's next basic attack within 0.25 seconds deals bonus physical damage. The damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

3.concerningText: Passive: Shaco's basic attacks  slow enemies for 2 seconds while Two-Shiv Poison is off cooldown.
Active: Shaco throws a dagger at the target enemy that upon arrival deals them magic damage,  increased by 50% if they are below 30% of their maximum health, and  slows them for 3 seconds.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

Keywords

Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Champion takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – NIGHTSTALKER: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and  slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Champion  takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you  invisibility for 1.5 seconds.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
